thread.title: Spotlight on Downingtown West QB Thomas Mattioni
thread.title_full: Spotlight on Downingtown West QB Thomas Mattioni

title: Spotlight on Downingtown West QB Thomas Mattioni
text:
Rick O'Brien, Inquirer Staff Writer Posted: Friday, October 9, 2015, 3:01 AM 
In leading the Whippets to a 5-0 start and No. 6 area ranking, Downingtown West quarterback Mattioni has completed 38 of 58 passes (65.5 percent) for 828 yards and 11 touchdowns. 
The 6-foot, 175-pound senior, who has been intercepted only once, has rushed 16 times for 98 yards and a score. He also sees time at defensive back. 
Mattioni went 6 for 6 for 266 yards and four TDs in a 41-3, season-opening win over Haverford High. Two weeks later, he was 9 for 12 for 184 yards and three scores in a 42-14 victory against Mifflin County. 
Mattioni started at wide receiver and defensive back the last two seasons. He earned second-team all-Ches-Mont League National Division honors on offense last year. More coverage
